about.title: About us
about.description: At Roberto Jewelry, every piece is personal. We come from a long tradition of craftsmanship in the Nijem family, where jewelry making is more than a skill it's a way of life. Passed down through three generations, this tradition began in Nazareth, a city known for its rich history and artistry. Founded by Viktor Nijem Senior, his Grandfather, Roberto Jewelry brings a modern touch to this heritage. Viktor's grandfather, a skilled craftsman who worked for decades in the field in a known custom made crafts for jewelry and gold called Qatuf, inspired a love for creating jewelry that lasts a lifetime. Today, Viktor combines time honored techniques with a fresh, thoughtful approach to design, making each piece feel special and unique with awards from world renowned clubs and associations to prove his passion for crafting unique one of a kind pieces.

beliefs.title: What We Believe
beliefs.subtitle: Jewelry should go beyond beauty it should be as unique as you are. At Roberto, we focus on:

craftsmanship.title:
ONE-OF-A-KIND
CRAFTSMANSHIP
craftsmanship.description: Every piece is custom made by hand, ensuring it's truly yours.

materials.title:
QUALITY
MATERIALS
materials.description: Using solid gold, natural gems, and responsibly sourced diamonds to create jewelry that lasts.

connection.title:
PERSONAL
CONNECTION
connection.description: Designs that incorporate meaningful details, like calligraphy, to celebrate your individuality.

recognitions.title: Recognitions and Achievements
recognitions.introduction: Viktor's passion for craftsmanship and innovation has earned him recognition from some of the most prestigious organizations in the world of fine jewelry:
achievements: A' Design Award Winner (2018-2019): Celebrated for the Global Warming Ring, a design that masterfully blends artistry with a powerful message of sustainability.

Membership in Esteemed Associations: Viktor's contributions to innovation and craftsmanship have been acknowledged by leading organizations such as the International Society of Product Manufacturers, the Design Association, and the World Design Consortium.
Honored by the International Council of Creative Industries Design: Recognized for redefining sustainable and artistic jewelry, pushing the boundaries of design and creativity.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Roberto?
whyChoose.description: When you choose Roberto Jewelry, you're choosing more than a piece of jewelry you're choosing a story, a connection, and a reflection of who you are. Each creation is designed with care, made to celebrate life's special moments, and crafted to be as unique as the person who wears it. At Roberto, we don't just make jewelry we make your jewelry.

hero.description: Discover our exquisite collection of handcrafted jewelry, where every piece tells a story of luxury, love, and lasting beauty.

reviews.title: What Our Clients Say
reviews.subtitle: Hear from those who have experienced the Roberto difference.

review1.text: The most beautiful engagement ring I've ever seen. The craftsmanship is absolutely extraordinary.
review1.name: Sarah Johnson

review2.text: Roberto created a custom necklace for my wife's anniversary. The attention to detail was incredible.
review2.name: Michael Chen

review3.text: Outstanding service and quality. My custom earrings exceeded all expectations.
review3.name: Emily Rodriguez
